events.description: The release of Italy's retail sales data for December 2025, which showed a month-on-month decline.

facts.fact_text: Italy’s retail sales decreased by 0.8% month-on-month in December 2025.

evidences.evidence_text: Italy’s retail sales decreased by 0.8% month-on-month in December 2025, reversing a 0.5% rise in each of the previous two months

facts.fact_text: Annual retail sales in Italy rose by 0.9% in December 2025.

evidences.evidence_text: On an annual basis, retail sales rose by 0.9%, easing from a 1.3% growth in each of the previous two months

facts.fact_text: Pharmaceuticals saw the largest gains among non-food items at 4.6%.

evidences.evidence_text: Among non-food items, the largest gains were observed in pharmaceuticals (4.6%)

facts.fact_text: E-commerce sales grew by 3.1% in December 2025.

evidences.evidence_text: The value of retail sales increased across all distribution channels: ... and e-commerce (3.1%).

facts.fact_text: Overall retail sales in 2025 were 0.8% higher than in 2024.

evidences.evidence_text: Overall, retail sales in 2025 were 0.8% higher than in 2024.

claims.claim_text: The retail sales data for December 2025 defied market expectations.

evidences.evidence_text: defying market expectations of a 0.4% increase.

evidence.evidence_text: Italy’s retail sales decreased by 0.8% month-on-month in December 2025
Sales for both food (-0.9% vs 0.4% in November) and non-food products (-0.7% vs 0.6%) declined.
